name: Memory Bank
description:
OBJECTIVE

Collect the most pairs of cards while filling in the missing letters.

HOW TO PLAY

Flip over any two cards (one at a time). 

Match = Letter revealed in Word + Money

Continue flipping cards and matching pairs until the Word is spelled.

TEAM MEMBERS
Programmer: Nemo2
Artist / UI: cafeDraw
Sound FX:  trueblood

Assets Used:
Music: Infinite Happiness by Maram Music
